LanguageData.Kurin_LostTail.stages.0.label: lost kurin tail
LanguageData.Kurin_LostTail.stages.0.description: One of my tails has been lost. This feels weird.
LanguageData.Kurin_LostTail.stages.1.label: lost kurin tail
LanguageData.Kurin_LostTail.stages.1.description: Two of my tails have been lost. My natural beauty has been ruined.
LanguageData.Kurin_LostTail.stages.2.label: lost kurin tail
LanguageData.Kurin_LostTail.stages.2.description: All of my tails are gone. I have lost my identity as a foxgirl. Existence is pain.
